body_html: A recent CL correcting this is now live on master. It includes a unit test that re-enters a variable scope and the original name scope this variable scope was created in (by using the new .original_name_scope property). See here: variable_scope_test. Closing this now, please re-open or make a new issue if you find more problems!

body: A recent CL correcting this is now live on master. It includes a unit test that re-enters a variable scope and the original name scope this variable scope was created in (by using the new .original_name_scope property). See here: [variable_scope_test](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/variable_scope_test.py#L297). Closing this now, please re-open or make a new issue if you find more problems!
